sentences.en: And you ate them with such gusto.
As he talked with more and more gusto, we came more and more under his spell.
sentences.cn: 他越说越起劲, 大家越听越入神.

sentences.en: Gorbachev downed his meal with gusto.
sentences.cn: 戈尔巴乔夫兴致勃勃地品尝着美味.

sentences.en: Hers was a minor part, but she played it with gusto.
sentences.cn: 她演的是个小角色，但是演得很投入。

sentences.en: However, bankers called the technocrats'bluff and proceeded to lend with gusto.
sentences.cn: 但是, 银行家们称技术专家官员不过在虚张声势,并且还会乐观的继续借贷业务.

sentences.en: However, bankers called the technocratsbluff and proceeded to lend with gusto.
sentences.cn: 然而, 银行业人士却认定高层不过在虚张声势,因而继续热情高涨地发放贷款.

sentences.en: Lei rispose:'sei un fusto ma per niente di mio gusto "
sentences.cn: 餐刀继续坚持: “ 你看我多帅 ”

sentences.en: She burst into song with great gusto, several passengers immediately joined in.
sentences.cn: 她热情地唱了起来, 几位乘客也跟着唱了.

sentences.en: Some of you will also delegate with gusto!
sentences.cn: 你可能也会乐意委托别人做事.
音乐家兴致勃勃地演奏.

sentences.en: They attacked their meal with gusto.
They fell to it with gusto.
sentences.cn: 他们兴致勃勃地干起来.

sentences.en: Three foremost aids to persuasion to me are humility, concentration, and gusto.
sentences.cn: 我认为说服的三个首要协助因素是谦恭 、 集中和兴趣.

sentences.en: Wall Street responded to the payrolls figures with gusto.
sentences.cn: 华尔街对就业数据作出了积极的反应.
